name: Pixel Jump II
description:
Pixel Jump II (the sequel to Pixel Jump) from Cubee Games

Keep the character jumping on the platform for as long as possible. The platform will move at a randomised velocity.

Features

  • 6 uniquely themed levels
  • Multiple characters to play.
  • Customisable character
  • Original sound/music
  • Original art

This title is the first release from Cubee Games.

Note: This title is also playable under Wine.
